about_the_game:
Several number cubes on your screen and your challenge is: destroy them all at once!

For this you must drop the balls in the right position and direction to find the perfect trajectory

Challenge yourself at each level with new mechanics

  • Walls, tunnels and cannons will challenge your physical intuition
  • New mechanics like revolving walls and moving cubes will challenge your accuracy

NEW! Level Editor

Create your own levels with the new level editor

  • There are several options of cubes, walls, tunnels and cannons for you to create levels and challenge yourself in your own way
  • Unlock all features by completing levels
  • Includes option to save created levels

Addictive new events

  • New visual effects in all mechanics
  • Various visual and sound effects will explode your screen with addictive events
  • Make the most of stereo sound effects

RESOURCES

  • New visual effects in all mechanics
  • New mechanics like revolving walls and moving cubes
  • New original soundtrack
  • 59 new exclusive levels
  • New level editor with save option

Other resources

  • Customization: Change the game color to the one you like best
  • Steam Cloud: Save game to cloud
  • Steam Achievements: 59 Steam achievements
detailed_description:
ALSO RECOMMENDED FOR YOU:





About the Game



Several number cubes on your screen and your challenge is: destroy them all at once!

For this you must drop the balls in the right position and direction to find the perfect trajectory

Challenge yourself at each level with new mechanics

  • Walls, tunnels and cannons will challenge your physical intuition
  • New mechanics like revolving walls and moving cubes will challenge your accuracy

NEW! Level Editor

Create your own levels with the new level editor

  • Unlock all features by completing levels

name: Destroy The Cubes 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

reviews:
“Great puzzle game with numbers and many amazing effects.”
Steam Reviewer
short_description: Destroy The Cubes 2 is a minimalist puzzle assembled with a mechanics of balls that destroy numerical cubes. Drop balls in the right position and direction to destroy all number cubes in the scene.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
